-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Prepare for full-scale war with Battlefield 3, the third major evolution of the 
long-running online battle franchise. Using the power of Frostbite 2 game engine 
technology, Battlefield 3 delivers superior visual quality, a grand sense of 
scale, massive destruction, dynamic audio and incredibly lifelike character 
animations. As bullets whiz by, walls crumble, and explosions throw you to the 
ground, the battlefield feels more alive and interactive than ever before.

In Battlefield 3, players step into the role of the elite U.S. Marines where 
they will experience heart-pounding single player missions and competitive 
multiplayer actions ranging across diverse locations from around the globe 
including Europe, Middle-East and North America.
